SELECT dmssa.id as id, dmssa.stat_year as statYear, dmssa.stat_month as statMonth, dmssa.pre_acc_sum_channel_amount as preAccSumChannelAmount, dmssa.acc_sum_channel_amount as accSumChannelAmount, dmssa.acc_sum_channel_margin as accSumChannelMargin, dmssa.pre_supplier_content as preSupplierContent, dmssa.curr_achieve_rate as currAchieveRate, dmssa.pre_achieve_rate as preAchieveRate FROM dashboard_monthly_sales_stati_acc dmssa where dmssa.stat_year = #{oneYearStr}

SELECT dmla.id as id, dmla.stat_year as statYear, dmla.stat_month as statMonth, dmla.defective_effect_amount_monthly as defectiveEffectAmountMonthly, dmla.defective_effect_amount_acc as defectiveEffectAmountAcc, dmla.stockout_sales_amount_monthly as stockoutSalesAmountMonthly, dmla.stockout_sales_amount_monthly_acc as stockoutSalesAmountMonthlyAcc, dmla.monthly_loss_amount as monthlyLossAmount FROM dashboard_monthly_loss_amount dmla where dmla.stat_year = #{oneYearStr} order by stat_year,stat_month asc

SELECT ddmhr.id as id, ddmhr.stat_month as statMonth, ddmhr.product_sort_code as productSortCode, ddmhr.product_sort_name as productSortName, ddmhr.channel_costs as channelCosts, ddmhr.channel_sales_amount as channelSalesAmount, ddmhr.channel_sales_yearonyear as channelSalesYearonyear, ddmhr.channel_sales_link_relative as channelSalesLinkRelative, ddmhr.channel_margin as channelMargin, ddmhr.channel_margin_yearonyear as channelMarginYearonyear, ddmhr.channel_margin_link_relative as channelMarginLinkRelative, ddmhr.distribution_sales_amount as distributionSalesAmount, ddmhr.distribution_margin as distributionMargin, ddmhr.channel_costs_yearonyear as channelCostsYearonyear, ddmhr.channel_costs_link_relative as channelCostsLinkRelative FROM dashboard_dep_monthly_homocyclic_ratio ddmhr where ddmhr.stat_month = #{oneMonthStr}

SELECT daklr.id as id, daklr.stat_year as statYear, daklr.defective_effect_amount as defectiveEffectAmount, daklr.stockout_sales_amount as stockoutSalesAmount, daklr.defective_effect_ratio as defectiveEffectRatio, daklr.stockout_ratio as stockoutRatio FROM dashboard_all_kinds_loss_ratio daklr where daklr.stat_year = #{oneYearStr}

SELECT ddcpsa.id as id, ddcpsa.stat_month as statMonth, ddcpsa.price_channel_code as priceChannelCode, ddcpsa.price_channel_name as priceChannelName, ddcpsa.product_sort_code as productSortCode, ddcpsa.product_sort_name as productSortName, ddcpsa.product_category_code as productCategoryCode, ddcpsa.product_category_name as productCategoryName, ddcpsa.product_property_code as productPropertyCode, ddcpsa.product_property_name as productPropertyName, sum(ddcpsa.channel_costs) as channelCosts, sum(ddcpsa.channel_sales_amount) as channelSalesAmount, sum(ddcpsa.channel_sales_yearonyear) as channelSalesYearonyear, sum(ddcpsa.channel_sales_link_relative) as channelSalesLinkRelative, sum(ddcpsa.distribution_sales_amount) as distributionSalesAmount, sum(ddcpsa.channel_margin) as channelMargin, sum(ddcpsa.channel_margin_yearonyear) as channelMarginYearonyear, sum(ddcpsa.channel_margin_link_relative) as channelMarginLinkRelative, sum(ddcpsa.distribution_margin) as distributionMargin FROM dashboard_dep_cate_proper_sales_amount ddcpsa where
ddcpsa.stat_month=#{statMonth} and
ddcpsa.product_sort_code=#{productSortCode} and
ddcpsa.price_channel_code=#{priceChannelCode} and
price_channel_code is not null and product_sort_code is not null and product_category_code is not null group by ddcpsa.product_category_code

SELECT ddpsa.id as id, ddpsa.stat_month as statMonth, ddpsa.product_sort_code as productSortCode, ddpsa.product_sort_name as productSortName, ddpsa.product_property_code as productPropertyCode, ddpsa.product_property_name as productPropertyName, sum(ddpsa.channel_costs) as channelCosts, sum(ddpsa.channel_sales_amount) as channelSalesAmount, sum(ddpsa.channel_sales_yearonyear) as channelSalesYearonyear, sum(ddpsa.channel_sales_link_relative) as channelSalesLinkRelative, sum(ddpsa.distribution_sales_amount) as distributionSalesAmount, sum(ddpsa.channel_margin) as channelMargin, sum(ddpsa.channel_margin_yearonyear) as channelMarginYearonyear, sum(ddpsa.channel_margin_link_relative) as channelMarginLinkRelative, sum(ddpsa.distribution_margin) as distributionMargin FROM dashboard_dep_proper_sales_amount ddpsa where
ddpsa.stat_month=#{statMonth} and
ddpsa.product_sort_code=#{productSortCode} and
ddpsa.price_channel_code=#{priceChannelCode} and
price_channel_code is not null and product_sort_code is not null and product_property_code is not null group by ddpsa.product_property_code

SELECT ddcsa.id as id, ddcsa.stat_month as statMonth, ddcsa.price_channel_code as priceChannelCode, ddcsa.price_channel_name as priceChannelName, ddcsa.product_sort_code as productSortCode, ddcsa.product_sort_name as productSortName, ddcsa.product_category_code as productCategoryCode, ddcsa.product_category_name as productCategoryName, sum(ddcsa.channel_costs) as channelCosts, sum(ddcsa.channel_sales_amount) as channelSalesAmount, sum(ddcsa.channel_sales_yearonyear) as channelSalesYearonyear, sum(ddcsa.channel_sales_link_relative) as channelSalesLinkRelative, sum(ddcsa.distribution_sales_amount) as distributionSalesAmount, sum(ddcsa.channel_margin) as channelMargin, sum(ddcsa.channel_margin_yearonyear) as channelMarginYearonyear, sum(ddcsa.channel_margin_link_relative) as channelMarginLinkRelative, sum(ddcsa.distribution_margin) as distributionMargin FROM dashboard_dep_cate_sales_amount ddcsa where
ddcsa.stat_month=#{statMonth} and
ddcsa.product_sort_code=#{productSortCode} and
ddcsa.price_channel_code=#{priceChannelCode} and
price_channel_code is not null and product_sort_code is not null and product_category_code is not null group by ddcsa.product_category_code

SELECT ddass.id as id, ddass.stat_year as statYear, ifNULL(ddass.channel_costs,0) as channelCosts, ifNULL(ddass.channel_amount,0) as channelAmount, ifNULL(ddass.channel_margin,0) as channelMargin, ifNULL(ddass.distribution_amount,0) as distributionAmount, ifNULL(ddass.distribution_margin,0) as distributionMargin, ifNULL(ddass.sales_budget,0) as salesBudget, ifNULL(ddass.achieve_rate,0) as achieveRate FROM dashboard_depart_annual_sales_stati ddass WHERE ddass.stat_year like concat('%',#{oneYearStr},'%')
SELECT dmla.id as id, dmla.stat_year as statYear, ifNULL(sum(dmla.monthly_loss_amount),0) as monthlyLossAmount FROM dashboard_monthly_loss_amount dmla where dmla.stat_year = #{oneYearStr}

SELECT ifNULL(SUM(ddcpsa.channel_sales_amount),0) channelSalesAmount FROM dashboard_dep_cate_proper_sales_amount ddcpsa WHERE ddcpsa.stat_month like concat('%',#{oneYearStr},'%') and ddcpsa.product_property_code = "7"

SELECT ifNULL(sum(ddmhr.channel_sales_amount),0) as channelSalesAmount FROM dashboard_dep_monthly_homocyclic_ratio ddmhr where
ddmhr.stat_month = #{statMonth} and
ddmhr.product_sort_code=#{productSortCode} and
ddmhr.price_channel_code=#{priceChannelCode} and
price_channel_code is not null and product_sort_code is not null

SELECT ifNULL(sum(ddmhr.channel_sales_amount),0) as channelSalesAmount FROM dashboard_dep_monthly_homocyclic_ratio ddmhr where

SELECT sum(dnm.negative_margin_sku_num) as negativeMarginSkuNum FROM dashboard_negative_margin dnm where
dnm.year_month = #{statMonth} and
dnm.product_sort_code=#{productSortCode} and
dnm.price_channel_code=#{priceChannelCode} and
price_channel_code is not null and product_sort_code is not null limit 1

SELECT sum(dsr.stockout_sku_num) / sum(dsr.sku_num_total) as stockoutRate FROM dashboard_stockout_rate dsr where
dsr.year_month = #{statMonth} and
dsr.product_sort_code=#{productSortCode} and
dsr.price_channel_code=#{priceChannelCode} and
price_channel_code is not null and product_sort_code is not null

SELECT sum(dra.amt) as amt FROM dashboard_return_amount dra where

dra.product_sort_code=#{productSortCode} and
